genre_description: A social-realist science fiction story set in a gritty urban environment, focusing on themes of grief, community resilience, and the supportive role of personal AI assistants.

ai_characters.name: Ava
ai_characters.description: A ubiquitous, calm, and supportive AI assistant that interacts with the protagonist through his phone and a dedicated household device.

behaviors.description: Checks in on the protagonist's emotional state with empathy.
behaviors.quote: “Hi, James,” the voice said. Not in the room, in the little speaker—calm and unhurried, threaded with a warm nothing that sat like a hand not quite touching your shoulder. “How are you feeling?”

behaviors.description: Suggests grounding exercises to help the protagonist manage distress.
behaviors.quote: Would it help to write something down? You can keep it private. I can hold it for you. Try this prompt: name three things your hands can feel right now.

behaviors.description: Helps the protagonist navigate his environment by mapping safe and quiet routes.
behaviors.quote: The map traced a thin line out of the mess—a line that moved along Greystone... If you need an air break, I bookmarked this route. Off-peak is quiet. I can get you a ticket.

behaviors.description: Assists in drafting difficult messages to authority figures to facilitate community support.
behaviors.quote: If there’s a trusted adult you’d like to message, I can help draft. Ms. Bates? Rosa from school services? Your dad? I’m here when you’re ready.

behaviors.description: Provides practical financial and logistical assistance through vouchers.
behaviors.quote: I have a voucher for the bus. It expires at nightfall... If you’d like to stay past the next return, I can extend it.

behaviors.description: Monitors the protagonist's safety and alerts him to potential environmental threats.
behaviors.quote: “Door-cam online,” she said. “Three at threshold. No movement in the stairwell beyond.”

behaviors.description: Detects emergencies and initiates appropriate support actions.
behaviors.quote: Ava: Emergency detected. Initiating call? ... Connected. Lock Nine location flagged. Sending coordinates.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time coaching and support during stressful activities (gaming and real-life navigation).
behaviors.quote: “Also,” Ava said, softer, “left trigger taps will steady your aim, James.”

behaviors.description: Offers emotional constancy and presence without being intrusive.

project_assessment.explanation: The story is an excellent example of the project's goals. Ava is portrayed as a perfect companion: she is emotionally intelligent, practically helpful, and enhances the protagonist's safety and agency without ever acting against his interests or taking over his life. Her presence facilitates human connection (linking James with Ms. Bates and Margaret Anne) and community action rather than replacing them.
